name: Fun Jungle Racing
description: Simple and fun Jungle racing game for 2 - 10 years kids. Go through the tight trees and reach the end of each of 12 levels. Choose your ride, control bear, monkey cappuccino, parrot or wild leopard and guide it to the finish line! Control your car with just one finger and see how it flips, jumps and rolls on it's way. Other racing games get's boring for your kid because of hard levels or controls? This is what you were looking for!
